column2:
"Manon's been working on releasing
the central barrier ever since our arrival..."

"Speaking of which,
have you seen the Commander?"
"Damn it!"
"Am I still not strong enough?! ...Hibana..."
"...Oh, it's you."
"If you blame yourself, you'll never move on."
"The power of one person has its limits."
"What?"

"...I know that.
Of course I know that..."
"Your methods aren't wrong."
"We all have our roles to play in this."
"I'm baaack!"
"Here ya go! Warm meal and a drink. Made it myself! Everyone, eat this and gather your strength."

"You've all had nothing but
rations since Altera Base, right?"

"You'll fall into a slump if you don't eat
a proper meal every now and then."

"I'm normally incredibly watchful about this
sort of thing... I give you my utmost thanks."

"If this continues, more
sacrifices are unavoidable..."

"Even still,
what else can I..."
"Well? Is it good?"
"It's delicious!"

"Right?! I pulled out
all the stops for this!"
"I'm so happy you like it!"

"Tastes so good you
can't even speak, huh!"

"I made sure to taste test, too.
I'm glad you like it!"

"How's Guren been
holding up, since...?"

"Something about him seemed to change
as soon as that giant DOLL showed up."

"Nilus Stia... yes. The Commander is
somewhat bound to it by fate, you see."

"Crawford and our Commander once
used to fight DOLLS together."

"There was a third ARKS with them, named Hibana.
The three of them made the perfect team."

"However, roughly ten years ago,
Nilus Stia attacked Central City."

"Thanks to the efforts of those three, it
was repelled... But this came at the cost of Hibana's life."

"Likely as a result of this, Crawford and the
Commander each went their separate ways..."

"Crawford, in an effort to lessen the number of
casualties in battle, focused on both bolstering defenses..."

"...As well as the development of powerful weapons,
ones that could win wars without ever risking a life..."

"The Commander, on the other hand,
went after Nilus Stia, to where it retreated..."

"You could say it's the main reason he's
here in the Stia Region to begin with..."

"The volunteers, including myself, are of the mind
that we should strike the enemy at its heart."

"To make sure that DOLLS like Nilus
Stia are eradicated from all of Halpha."
"So that's what it was..."
"C-Commander!"
"...Tell this to Crawford."

"This fight was my decision.
You can focus on your own battle."
"Commander..."

"I've hacked into the central region's systems
through the control terminals in the north and south."

"I should be able to remove
the outer barriers shortly."

"Everyone, prepare to assault!
I'll leave the organization to you."
"Understood, sir."
